abstract.p: Photos of flowery and sparkly fashion accessories seen in New York City (On the Street column) (M)

block.p: The urge to decorate oneself with fashion accessories is back in focus, after being banished during the 1990's minimalist putsch. Roses are blooming on shoulders, hoop earings are dangling, and strings of rhinestones form belts. Even the late-1940's fedora with a veil made the scene during the first week of autumn. ''Sex and the City'' is a big influence on the trend, but it actually started three years ago in Italy, when the design team Dolce & Gabbana decorated dresses with butterflies and when designer handbags like the Fendi baguette appeared, signaling the rise of accessories as the star of fashion.
